attributes.title: 2010 Toyota Auris 1.6 XS

attributes.description:
This Ranger is in very good original condition with full-service history and accident free. Perfect for the 4x4 enthusiast or camping weekends away. Light on fuel and enough power to hook your 4x4 Trailer/Caravan. Comes with A/C, P/Steering, Remote C/Locking, Alarm, Auto Headlights On/Off, E/Windows, E/Mirrors, Multi-Function steering wheel, Cruise Control, Factory Radio/CD Player with Bluetooth/Aux/USB, Rear Diff-Lock, Downhill Assist, LED Light-Bar with controller switch, Nudge-Bar, Bonnet Guard, Side Steps, 17" Renegade mag wheels, Smash/Grab Window tint, Window shields, Monroe shocks with LEVEL IT spacers in front, Roof Rack, Leisure Cattle rail with opening sides and canvas cover to use as a canopy(needs some TLC), Canvas seat covers(not in photos), Tow-Bar, Rubberized load-bin with 12V power supply. 

All vehicles sold with 1 month/1500kms warranty OR 2 year mechanical breakdown warranty as optional.

All trade ins welcome.

Please feel free to view our stock @ www.theosbakkiesales.co.za

Theos Bakkie Sales
73 Van Riebeeck Rd (next to Nandos)
Kuilsriver
Cape Town
